name: Space Ashes
description:
Space Ashes is a slow paced arcade game where you control a ship sent on space stations to burn swarming forms of vegetation. Shut down the air system, turn off the lights and burn them all! But beware, those life forms can become aggressive...

A not so easy game with a relaxing ambiance.Key Features
-Move around while defying gravity
-20 nonlinear levels
-Explore to find secrets
-Overwhelming vegetation
-Uncontrollable spores
-Bosses!
